InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Dominator II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Talon
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 2

Designed to track an opponent’s electromagnetic signature, the Dominator strike missile is a precision ordnance package designed to establish tactical battlefield dominance.

InstalledItem.Name: Dominator II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Talon
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 2

Designed to track an opponent’s electromagnetic signature, the Dominator strike missile is a precision ordnance package designed to establish tactical battlefield dominance.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-221 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 2xS1

Behring’s MSD-221 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Decoy Launcher
InstalledItem.Description: Anvil Decoy Launcher

InstalledItem.Name: ArcticStorm
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

If you’re after a cooler that balances performance, durability and stealth, then look to the ArcticStorm. This mid-grade cooler from Lightning Power Ltd uses their centuries old technology to provide performance that can be relied upon.

InstalledItem.Name: Specialty Hornet S5 VariPuck Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 5

A ‘special mission’ weapon mount from Flashfire Systems designed to allow the Hornet to attach weapons one size smaller than the hardpoint the VariPuck is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Revenant Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 4

If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. And if you want it broke, aim a Revenant at it. Solidly built on a foundation of centuries-old tech, Apocalypse Arms puts an innovative spin on battle-tested designs to create a rugged ballistic Gatling that can steadily hurtle death across the void. Though it’s slow to spin up and cool down, the Revenant’s dependability makes it a favorite for those expecting to find trouble.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

InstalledItem.Name: Roughneck
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Industrial

For its class, the Roughneck power plant from Juno Starwerk is an ideal component for haulers looking for maximum performance.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: RSI Self Destruct
InstalledItem.Description: [PH] RSI Self Destruct

InstalledItem.Name: Ping
InstalledItem.Description: Ping

InstalledItem.Name: Tarantula GT-870 Mark 3 Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 3

Fed by Gallenson Tactical’s patented SpinGlide drum ammunition system, the Tarantula GT-870 Mk3 can smoothly and accurately deliver a consistent stream of ballistic shells. Though it only has a moderate rate of fire, its trustworthy durability makes it a dependable addition to any fight.
